== Ubuntu Advertisements and Buttons for Websites ==

The buttons were put together by AaronWaite. Copy the images to your server and use them to link to <code>http://www.ubuntu.com</code>. (It is not advisable to link directly to images in a wiki, as they are likely to be moved around.
